docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome

This website is a quiet space — part lab, part journal — where I document what I learn, what I question, and what I build.

I also use this space to document what inspires me in a wide range of mediums.

🧠 Core Focus: - Computational science - Self Study - Philosophical reflection - Media Journal

This website was created using MKDocs, show them some love!

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Who am I?

My name is Lethiwe Mwendwa and I am a software engineer interested in Computational Science, Maths and Physics.

Most recently I was an Intern at Microsoft in London, and a Senior Committee member of Nottingham Trent University's Developer's Society.

  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
  • CodeWars

docs.title: Welcome to my digital portfolio!
docs.text:
Introduction post;

This blog is a huge step towards documenting and presenting my past and current work.

I plan to add all of my past favourite bits of coursework with descriptions of what I learned as a first step, and then move forward with what I'm currently working on, as I start to dip my toes in volunteer work and open source contribution.

Looking forward to presenting my work, and developing much more here!

-- Lethiwe
